keywords.value: MELTZER, MONROE "MICKEY." BORN IN BROOKLYN ON JUNE 20
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: MELTZER--Monroe "Mickey." Born in Brooklyn on June 20, 1925. Devoted husband of Joan for 68 years, beloved father of Ileane, Sara, Amy and Marjorie, loving father-in-law to Jerry and Scott. Proud Papa who bonded with grandchildren: Joshua, Jeremy, Jennifer, Jackson, Sara and her husband Michael. He brought laughter to all. He will be greatly missed. 1/3
